name: countingcoach
0:
”Alexa, ask Counting Coach to count to five”
”Alexa, tell Counting Coach to count from five to eight”
”Alexa, ask Counting Coach to count to three very slowly”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: counting coach
des:
Counting Coach can help you if you need a sparring partner in your workouts, are practicing a choreography, playing hide and seek with your kids, or teaching them how to count.

Examples:

Alexa, ask Counting Coach to count to twenty (will count in a regular 1 second pace from 1 to 20).

Alexa, tell Counting Coach to from one to eight fast (won't pause as much).

Alexa, ask Counting Coach to count to 3 very slowly (will make a longer pause between numbers and pronounce slowly and more clearly).

You can ask the skill to count between two numbers and to do it slow, very slowly, fast and very fast.

Easter Egg: Try saying "Alexa, ask Counting Coach to count to 10 in whale".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
